sect1.title: Accessing the Program
sect1.para:
Gpe-Record-Memo is accessable in the utilities folder. To access it tap on the record memo icon.
GPE Utilities Folder
Main Application Screen

sect1.title: Using the Application
sect1.para:
To record a memo simply type in your desired memo name and tap ok. When you are finished recording tap ok to save your memo.
One some devices, this application can be accessed additionally through the 'record' button.
